fields.description: You can generate an API key for Gemini by visiting the following link: https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
fields.label: API Key

fields.description: Check if the API key is a subscription key
fields.label: Is Subscription

fields.description: Check if the API key is a free key.
fields.label: Is Free

fields.description:
Recommended for Free Tier Users:
If you're using the free plan, this feature will automatically switch to another available model when the current one reaches its limit, so your requests can still be handled.

Note: If all available models also reach their RPM limit, it's recommended to purchase a subscription for uninterrupted access.
fields.label: Automatically switch the model when the RPM threshold is exceeded.
About
fields.options:
Limitation and Use of NextAI

  • This is very useful for generating content about a topic.
  • Useful for correcting grammar.
  • This is used to generate content and correct the content. The user should keep in mind that the LLM can make mistakes.

How to Reach Us
